personal.name: Amici Creativa
personal.title: Logo Bumper
personal.heroDescription: Crafting captivating visual stories with motion graphics, animation, and creative design.

about.bio:
Amici creativa adalah usaha kreatif yang bergerak di bidang jasa motion bumper logo untuk kebutuhan event,umkm,dan perusahaan. kami menghadirkan animasi motion mempunyai visual menarik dan modern yang tepat untuk logo perusahaan ataupun event lainnya.dengan kreativitas di dalam desain motion yang sesuai dengan nama bisnis ini perusahaan dan brand dapat membangun citra yang lebih 
Professional dan dikenal.A passionate motion graphics artist with expertise in creating compelling visual narratives. I specialize in transforming complex ideas into engaging animations that captivate audiences and elevate brands.

projects.title: Brand Animation Reel
projects.description: Dynamic logo animations and brand identity sequences for various clients.

projects.description: Engaging 3D product visualization and explainer animation for tech startup.

projects.description: Experimental motion graphics exploring form, color, and movement.

projects.description: Series of short-form content for Instagram and TikTok marketing campaign.

projects.title: Broadcast Package
projects.description: Complete broadcast graphics package including lower thirds, transitions, and title sequences.

projects.description: Character design and animation for educational video series.
